description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

targets.expr: count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace) - (count(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace) or vector(0)) or count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",namespace="${namespace}"}==1) by(namespace)

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (daemonset)
* on(daemonset) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (daemonset))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (daemonset)
* on(daemonset) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (daemonset))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (daemonset)
* on(daemonset) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory", namespace="$namespace"}) by (daemonset))

max(group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (daemonset)
* on(daemonset) group_right() max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace"}) by (daemonset))

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",container!="",container!="POD"}[5m])) by (pod, container)

group(kube_pod_info{namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(container_memory_usage_bytes{container!="POD",container!="",namespace="$namespace"}) by(container, pod)

group(kube_pod_info{ namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{ namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)

group(kube_pod_info{ namespace="$namespace",created_by_kind="DaemonSet",pod_ip!="", created_by_name="$daemonset"}) by (pod)
* on(pod) group_right() max(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{ namespace="$namespace", container!="POD", container!=""}[5m])) by (pod,container)

title: AWS-Test-Kubernetes-Daemonset
